set.seed(200)                                            
df <- data.frame(x = 1:10,
                   y1 = rnorm(5),
                   y2 = runif(5),
                   y3 = rpois(5, 1))
 
# Reshape data frame
df_reshaped <- data.frame(x = df$x,                           
                       y = c(df$y1, df$y2, df$y3),
                       group = c(rep("y1", nrow(df)),
                                 rep("y2", nrow(df)),
                                 rep("y3", nrow(df))))
 




a <- c(a, s, f, )
